item.title: [z508] Korasi Special Hits 0
item.dc:creator: @ExitWound ExitWound
item.description:
@ExitWound wrote:

Hello all! I’ve coded a perfect Korasi’s sword special into my server, but I need help… How do I make it so the special never misses like on normal RS?

EDIT:
I figure there is a code somewhere that calculated whether or not you hit 0… So maybe if I put something like this:

if (p.weapon == 1297) { if (p.usingSpecial) { return; } }
But where exactly would I put that?

Read full topic
